description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower Nuggets With Yoghurt Dipping Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot canapés,Pescatarian,Halal,Microwave,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Back to school,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Cauliflower Nuggets With Yoghurt Dipping Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper
Cut cauliflower into small florets, place in a microwave-safe bowl and cook on high for 3 minutes or until soft.
Place cooked cauliflower in a food processor and blitz to small pieces. Add the egg, breadcrumbs, cheese, herbs, garlic powder, salt and pepper and blitz until mixture combines.
Spoon tablespoons of mixture onto lined baking tray and shape into nuggets. Bake for 10 minutes before turning and baking for a further 10 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, to make dipping sauce place yoghurt, coriander and lemon juice in a small bowl and stir to combine.
Remove cauliflower nuggets from oven and allow to cool slightly before serving with yogurt dipping sauce.
